tunnelLayout.footerLegals: (1) Discount calculated on the lowest Alltricks price charged during the 30 days preceding the start date of the promotion for this product. (2) Discount calculated on the lowest Alltricks price charged during the 30 days preceding the start date of the sales. (3) Discount calculated on the lowest Alltricks price charged during the 30 days preceding the start date of the clearance sale for this product. (4) Free shipping on orders over £100 with DPD. Valid only in mainland France and on all products sold and shipped by Alltricks. (5) From GMT+1 time zone. (6) Depending on the time the order is placed, the delivery location and subject to immediate payment. Valid only on all products in stock sold and shipped by Alltricks. (7) Generally observed delivery times. (8) Generally observed time for preparing your order for all products in stock sold and shipped by Alltricks. (9) Code to be entered before confirming your basket. (10) Financing offer without insurance with mandatory deposit, reserved for individuals and valid for all purchases between £80 and £6,000. Subject to acceptance by Oney Bank. You have a 14-day withdrawal period to cancel your credit. Example in 3 instalments for a purchase of £150, deposit of £52.51, then 2 monthly payments of £50. Credit over 2 months at a fixed APR of 22.59%. Financing cost £2.51 up to a maximum of £30. Example of 4 instalments for a purchase of €400, down payment of €110, then 3 monthly payments of €100. Credit over 3 months at a fixed APR of 22.63%. Financing cost: €10 up to a maximum of €60. Conditions as of 13/11/2024, subject to change. For more information, visit [www.oney.fr](https://www.oney.fr/). Oney Bank - SA with capital of €71,801,205 - 34 Avenue de Flandre 59 170 Croix - RCS Lille Métropole – 546 380 197 – Orias no. 07 023 261 www.orias.fr – Correspondence: CS 60 006 – 59 895 Lille Cedex 9 – www.oney.fr. (11) Subject to immediate payment. (12) 10% of orders may be subject to random checks by Oney, requiring an additional 24 hours. (13) Free and unlimited delivery valid for 1 year for mainland France excluding Corsica after subscribing to the Alltricks+ offer with Chronopost relais, Mondial Relay, Colissimo and France Express with no minimum purchase. Free for purchases over £25 with Chronopost home delivery. Valid only on all products sold and shipped by Alltricks. (14) Additional 10% discount valid with no minimum purchase on all products sold and shipped by Alltricks. Discount sent by email on your birthday after subscribing to the Alltricks+ offer, valid once. (15) Recommended retail price by the supplier (or retail price communicated by the partner seller in the case of products from partner sellers). (16) In January 2015, via a vote by Trustpilot users, among the e-commerce sites on the Trustpilot platform. (17) A credit commitment is binding and must be repaid. Check your repayment capacity before committing. (18) Excluding partner seller products.

emptyCartCard.title: Your basket is empty
emptyCartCard.description: Getting kitted out has never been easier

header.title: Protect your bicycle!
header.description: Choose insurance and ride with peace of mind!

coverage.depreciation: No depreciation in the first year

goods.title: Covered items
goods.content: All bicycles sold by Alltricks (electric, mountain, road, city, children's, etc.) are insurable against theft and damage.

breakage.title: Breakage covered
breakage.content: In the event of accidental damage, the insurance covers the repair or replacement of the bicycle, or pays financial compensation if repair is impossible. The insurance covers these products for non-professional use and excludes competitions, sporting events, trials and races.

theft.title: Theft covered
theft.content: The insurance covers theft at home, on public roads (except between 11 p.m. and 7 a.m.) or when travelling in mainland France, including Corsica and Monaco. The insurance pays compensation directly into your bank account.

details.residence: The insured must have their main residence in France.
details.billing: The billing address corresponds to the address of the insured's main residence.
details.claim: Two claims per year are covered, with a maximum of £9,000 including VAT per claim.
details.depreciation: In the event of a claim in the second year, a depreciation rate of 1% per month applies from the 13th month onwards.

staff.label: Staff discount
staff.cgv: I have read and understood the terms and conditions regarding staff discounts.

validity.successMessage: Your staff discount has been applied to eligible products (sold by Alltricks).
validity.errorMessage: There was an error. Please try again.

staff.conditionsDescription:
All AVANIS employees (permanent, fixed-term, interns and work-study students) are eligible for this discount (from the moment they join the company and for the entire duration of their contract).



The purchase of one or more products, with the discount applied, is reserved exclusively for employees and their households (spouses and children) and is not for profit or resale.



Regarding payment, the order must be paid for using a payment method in the employee's name.



For information, the discount is calculated according to the following rule: up to 30% off the Alltricks retail price, within the limit of the cost price for Alltricks and a maximum reduction of 40% on the recommended retail price.



The discount applies all year round and to all products sold by Alltricks.



The staff discount cannot be combined with other promotional codes, Alltricks+ cashback or gift vouchers obtained through Troc Vélo sales.



The order limit is set at £5,000 per calendar year, excluding adult bicycles, per employee.



With regard to adult bicycles, you may purchase up to two adult bicycles per calendar year* with no limit on the amount.



*Limited to one adult bicycle per contract/presence of less than or equal to 6 months in the company.

assemblyModal.partialOrTotalAssemblyQuestion: Partial or 100% assembly, what is it?

details.one: (1) Bike fully assembled, checked and adjusted by our expert mechanics. To reduce the environmental impact of transport, we have removed the front wheel and pedals from your bike. This makes the box lighter and less bulky. All you have to do is reassemble them and enjoy your new bike. We recommend adjusting the saddle height and tyre pressure and suspension to suit your preferences.
details.two: (2) Within 2 years of purchasing the bicycle.
details.three: (3) Within 3 months of purchasing the bicycle. Servicing is only valid in one of our Alltricks shops. Find information on the details of Bronze and Gold servicing here: <link>www.alltricks.fr/surl/l-atelier</link>

basicServicesTable.details: (1) Bike fully assembled, checked and adjusted by our expert mechanics. To reduce the environmental impact of transport, we have removed the front wheel and pedals from your bike. This makes the box lighter and less bulky. All you have to do is reassemble it and enjoy your new bicycle. We recommend adjusting the saddle height and tyre pressure and suspension to suit your preferences.

items.note: A number of assembly steps will be required before riding
Assembled, checked and adjusted by our expert mechanics

items.service: First service free at Alltricks stores
items.access: Priority access to our experts for 3 months

items.service: 3 servicing appointments + 2 hours of labour free of charge for 2 years
items.access: Priority access to our experts for 1 year
